backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing home‑page improvements, associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing short summaries for many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting base URL, meta tags, root div, and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Contains the icp0.io domain used for canister domain verification.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Production smoke‑test checklist covering routing, assets, interactivity, console errors, and IC base‑path behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes (Home, Services, Contact) with base‑path normalization for IC deployments.
frontend/src/components/FaujiIcon.tsx: Displays one of four icon variants by cropping a generated sprite sheet via publicAssetUrl.
Empty placeholder for a gallery lightbox component.
frontend/src/components/HeroCarousel.tsx: Animated, accessible hero carousel with reduced‑motion support, auto‑advance, keyboard controls, and image overlays.
frontend/src/components/home/AmbassadorS: Displays an ambassador showcase with headings, banner image, portraits, and trust indicators using scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/home/CustomerSta: Renders a stats and testimonials section using animated cards and content from CUSTOMER_STATS.
frontend/src/components/home/ProfitExamp: Displays profit examples with animated cards, highlights, and a WhatsApp CTA using PROFIT_EXAMPLES content.
frontend/src/components/ImageWithFallbac: Image component that swaps to a styled fallback UI when the source fails and resets error state on src changes.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveServi: Displays three animated service cards with images, descriptions, and CTAs, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/ProductionDiagno: Shows a fixed diagnostics panel listing BASE_URL and core asset URLs for production debugging.
frontend/src/components/RevealOnScroll.t: Wraps children with a fade‑up animation that triggers when the element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeading.t: Renders a section heading with optional subtitle and description, supporting left or center alignment.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Provides a footer with brand info, navigation links, contact details, and a credits bar.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile slide‑in menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the page layout with header, footer, contact bar, routed content, and optional diagnostics panel.
frontend/src/components/StickyContactBar: Shows a mobile‑only fixed bottom bar with call and WhatsApp quick‑action buttons.
frontend/src/content/faujiFinanceContent: Provides static content for various site sections including hero, about, team, services, and contact details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status handling via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewOnce.ts: Hook that reveals elements once when they enter the viewport, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion setting and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating all data is static and requires no queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, typography rules, motion utilities, and custom scroll/spacing utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, loading App and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a full contact page with hero section, call and WhatsApp cards, team contacts, and Google Maps integration.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the gallery page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero carousel, contact CTAs, services, stats, testimonials, and ambassador sections.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays service offerings, required documents, and process steps with hero banner and animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/TeamPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the team page.
frontend/src/utils/debugImages.ts: Empty placeholder for image debugging utilities.
frontend/src/utils/googleMaps.ts: Provides helpers to generate Google Maps search and embed URLs without an API key.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs using the runtime base path, ensuring correct loading in non-root deployments.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, tokens, dark mode, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state for a fintech website rebuild, including required ambassador images and feature requests for homepage visual improvements, layout fixes, animations, and new content sections.
